entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
